title: U.S. is still a 'global leader,' Harris says on Asia trip, as allies fret over China, Afghanistan
content:
1. U.S. is still a 'global leader,' Harris says on Asia trip, as allies fret over China, Afghanistan  The Washington Post
  2. Harris laughs at, shuts down questions as she says Afghanistan is her highest priority  Yahoo News
  3. Harris in Singapore as U.S. tries to counter China's influence  NBC News
  4. Kamala Harris says U.S. focus on Afghan evacuations, pledges open South China Sea  Reuters
  5. US vice president will be widely questioned during Southeast Asia trip: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 米国は依然として「グローバルリーダー」であるとハリスがアジア歴訪で述べたが、同盟国は中国とアフガニスタンを懸念している
哈里斯在亚洲之行中说，美国仍然是 "全球领导者"，而盟国对中国和阿富汗感到担忧
哈里斯在亞洲之行中說，美國仍然是 "全球領導者"，而盟國對中國和阿富汗感到擔憂
